subject: Re: [junit] [announce] Cactus v1.2 is released
msgSnippet: ... From: fanyun  To:  Sent: Wednesday, September 26, 2001 3:03 AM Subject: RE: [junit] [announce] Cactus v1.2 is
messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "fanyun" <yun.fan@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 26, 2001 3:03 AM
Subject: RE: [junit] [announce] Cactus v1.2 is released


> Dear Cactus Team:
>
> I am looking for a testing tools, and find that may open source
group(jakarta) use Junit. What is Cactus? and is any group going to use
it? Is it better then junit?
>

Check http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus and yes several open source projects
are already using it (Jetspeed, Struts, Expresso, ...). It is also used in
production by several persons on their own company projects. Check the
"feedback" poll on the Cactus web site to get a feeling on what persons are
doing with it.

-Vincent
